file_content.text: You left Tas-La because I asked. You told your kin to fight for the Republic and be paid in land and weapons.
You've done well, but I swore I wouldn't abandon you on that festering pus-hole of a world.
My Chosen bear my message, and I'm coming to Taris soon.
She has spoken, and we treasure her words. Honor the Chronicles of Ki Sazen.
